sentences.en: Economy is the poor man's mintand extravagance the rich man's pitfall.
sentences.cn: 节约是穷人的造币厂,浪费是富翁的陷阱.

sentences.en: Economy the poor man's mints; extravagance the rich man's pitfall ─ Martin Farquhar Tupper.
sentences.cn: 节约是穷人的造币厂, 浪费是富人的陷阱─马丁.法夸尔. 塔珀.

sentences.en: Economy the poor man's mints; extravagance the rich man's pitfall.
sentences.cn: 节约是穷人的造币厂, 浪费是富人的陷阱.

sentences.en: I'll help with trying to avoid that pitfall.
sentences.cn: 我会帮助你们试着去躲开这个陷阱.

sentences.en: If that is the case, China might be able to avoid the pitfall of hubris.
sentences.cn: 如果事实如此, 中国也许能避免高傲自大的缺点.

sentences.en: Only this way will you avoid the great pitfall: the film a la these.
sentences.cn: 只有这样你才可以避免电影上最大的缺陷.

sentences.en: So the pitfall never happens in Java.
sentences.cn: 所以这个缺点在Java里永远不会造成更严重的后果.

sentences.en: The biggest potential pitfall may not be technical but budgetary.
sentences.cn: 最大的潜在陷阱可能不是技术问题,而是预算.

sentences.en: The pitfall is that the results will be difficult to interpret.
sentences.cn: 困难在于试验的结果将是难以解释的.

sentences.en: The pitfall is the trappings of success can catch you off guard.
sentences.cn: 陷阱就是,成功的表象来袭时,你可能猝不及防.

sentences.en: the pitfalls associated with the purchase of a used car
sentences.cn: 购买旧车时可能遇到的圈套

sentences.en: The wolf was caught in a pitfall.
sentences.cn: 那只狼是利用陷阱捉到的.

sentences.en: To avoid this pitfall, pay careful attention to eliminate internet - clogging elements on your web site.
sentences.cn: 为了避免发生这种情况,你应该专注于减少站点中类似于这种不利因素的发生.

trans.tran_en: a problem or difficulty that is likely to happen in a particular job, course of action, or activity
